name: Forest Patrol
description:
Help Raccoon collect treasure and clean the forest! In this 2d platformer you will guide Raccoon as he collects garbage in an autumn forest.

Music: Daniel B

Narrative: Owl_SeeYouLater

Programming: Crofty, Drowzee

Art: Dr. Vectrex, Inartdel

Sound Design: EclipseMT

Made for Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022
